parameters.responseBody:
={
  "success": true,
  "message": "Ticket received and processed by N8N",
  "ticketNumber": "{{ $('Webhook - New Ticket').first().json.data.ticketNumber }}",
  "priority": "{{ $('Webhook - New Ticket').first().json.data.priority }}",
  "actions": [
    {{ $('High Priority Alert').first().json ? '"High priority alert logged"' : '"Normal priority processed"' }},
    "Ticket logged successfully"
  ],
  "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}"
}
